PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE DEBORAH K. SMITH, Associate Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia, to be Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia, and a Judge ex officio of the Nova Scotia Court of Appeal.
